channel.title: Newbie Forum of Lies 1 - The Blue Dragon and Fool win!
channel.description:
## [color=green]Welcome to NFoL 1! (Newbie Forum of Lies)[/color] *Hosted by Marluxion, Queen_Alfa and Ashe!*
## [color=green]Newbie Forum of Lies?[/color] For the first 48 hours of the thread opening, ONLY players who have never played in a forum of lies game may join! The host and co-host will also be readily avaliable to answer any questions you may have about Forum of Lies!
After 48 hours have passed, the floodgates open and any players may join. Other than that, this is effectively a classic forum of lies game!
### [color=green] Rules [/color]
https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-official-hub/1515
### [color=green] Gameplay [/color] Days will be 3 IRL days long, or shorter if someone dies Nights will be 1 IRL day long Actions are done by messaging me Unseen/Cult will talk through a special Discord server Priest will speak with the dead through a separate Forum PM Chain All classes will be used, and will be used as they are found in the [Class Cards Thread](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-class-cards-now-officially-official/1998) When you receive a card you will have 24 hours to reply, confirming you have received it
### [color=green] Executions [/color] To accuse someone say "**/accuse [player]**" or "**/vote [player]**" Once a player reaches a majority of the accusations, they are put on trial. Trials last 24 hours (ended early if Majority is reached on execute or pardon (or the king decides their fate)) Trials do not extend the day.
### [color=green] Journals [/color] Message me your entire journal, the last draft I receive before you die shall be the one displayed
### [color=green] To Join[/color] To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like "I want to join" or "/join" or "/in" or "sign me up, coach" or whatever you want
# [color=green]Players: [/color] 1. **overthebin** 2. **GamerPoke** 3. [color=red]**judekat**[/color] - [color=green]**The Alchemist**[/color] - [**Died Night 2**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/newbie-forum-of-lies-1-day-3-13-16-now-youre-thinking-with-potions/71796/1585?u=ashe) 4. [color=red]**Solic**[/color] - [color=steblue]**The Knight**[/color] - [**Died Night 3**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/newbie-forum-of-lies-1-night-3-12-16-hidden-blade/71796/2791?u=marluxion) 5. **Shurian** 6. **MathBlade** 7. **omfgcookies** 8. **Luxy** 9. **redrabbit** 10. **Icibalus** :crown: 11. **NozBugz** 12. [color=red]**Bazingaboy**[/color] - [color=purple]**The Assassin**[/color] - [**Executed Day 3**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/newbie-forum-of-lies-1-day-3-13-16-now-youre-thinking-with-potions/71796/2788?u=marluxion) 13. [color=red]**PoisonedSquid**[/color] - [color=steblue]**The Court Wizard**[/color] - [**Died Night 1** ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/newbie-forum-of-lies-1-day-2-15-16-a-ball-to-die-for/71796/514?u=marluxion) 14. [color=red]**Livicus**[/color] - [color=steblue]**The Princess**[/color] - [**Died Night 3**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/newbie-forum-of-lies-1-night-3-12-16-hidden-blade/71796/2791?u=marluxion) 15. [color=red]**Wolfy**[/color] - [color=purple]**The Mastermind**[/color] - [**Vanished (Executed) Day 4**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/newbie-forum-of-lies-1-day-5-9-16-silent-night/71796/3346?u=marluxion) 16. [color=red]**Firekitten**[/color] - [color=hotpink]**The Fool**[/color] - [**Executed Day 2** ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/newbie-forum-of-lies-1-day-2-15-16-a-ball-to-die-for/71796/1576?u=marluxion)
Backups: Sam17z, Insanity, Shurian, Icibalus, NozBugz
# [color=green]Shortcuts[/color] [**Start of Day 1** - All hail King Captain!](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/newbie-forum-of-lies-1-day-2-15-16-a-ball-to-die-for/71796/354?u=marluxion) [**Start of Day 2** - PoisonedSquid was found dead! ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/newbie-forum-of-lies-1-day-2-15-16-a-ball-to-die-for/71796/514?u=marluxion) [**Start of Day 3** - Judekat was found dead!](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/newbie-forum-of-lies-1-day-3-13-16-now-youre-thinking-with-potions/71796/1584?u=queen_alfa) [**Start of Day 4** - Solic and Livicus were found dead!](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/newbie-forum-of-lies-1-night-3-12-16-hidden-blade/71796/2791?u=marluxion) [**Start of Day 5** - No one has died?](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/newbie-forum-of-lies-1-day-5-9-16-silent-night/71796/3346?u=marluxion)
